remarks: Define class of all Hilbert spaces.  Based on Proposition 4.5, p. 176, Gudrun Kalmbach, Quantum Measures and Spaces, Kluwer, Dordrecht, 1998. (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement: df-hil $p |- Hil = { h e. PreHil | dom ( proj ` h ) = ( CSubSp ` h ) } $.
